titles.title: O Come Let us Adore Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O come let us adore Him,
O come let us adore Him,
O come let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He alone is worthy,
For He alone is worthy,
For He alone is worthy,
Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We’ll give Him all the glory,
We’ll give Him all the glory,
We’ll give Him all the glory,
Christ the Lord.
